entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
